actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to permit the use of saccharin as a food, food additive, drug, and cosmetic for 12 months.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to permit the marketing of saccharin and any food additive, drug, and cosmetic containing saccharin for 12 months.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to permit the use of saccharin as a food, food additive, drug, and cosmetic for 12 months.
